name: Door Man
description:
Controls   WASD/Arrow keys - Move Space - Continue/Restart level, when you succeed or fail respectively Story You are the door man, please be so kind as to help our friend navigate her way through the house. She has a short temper and doesn't like waiting.

Notice:  The source code is available from this page in the form of a GameMaker YYZ file, to comply with the Ludum Dare rules.
